channel.title: Email in new topics
channel.description:
This one is probably for @Anthony and @Nicolas. We might want to enable "email in" to allow devs to create new topics via email for the `Development` and `Core` categories. While there is a risk of this being abused in the future, we can always disable it if it becomes a problem.
What do you think?

item.description:
